TitleEnglish: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.: Reawakened
SummaryEnglish: Kusuo and his gaggle of self-proclaimed friends are back for more psychic mishaps. If he didn't have enough problems before, he's got even more now.

1.TitleEnglish: Three Men, A Little Girl, A Police Officer and A Dog
1.SummaryEnglish: Kusuo and his "friends" search for a missing dog. Kusuo discovers the intricacies of online gaming, then the world of adults as his father's stand-in.

2.SummaryEnglish: Broken headgear spells trouble for Kusuo's home life. Kaido ropes his friends into a children's card game and loses in more ways than one.

3.TitleEnglish: New Teacher With an Outstanding Feature
3.SummaryEnglish: A sincere new teacher's creepy-looking face leads to mishaps and misunderstandings when the class sets out to find a peeping tom.

4.SummaryEnglish: Toritsuka ropes Kusuo into helping him after a cute transfer student bumbles into their lives. She might be more than Kusuo can handle.

5.SummaryEnglish: Nendo's friends get mistaken for bullies. Kusuo escapes his friends before their plans to have an escape room adventure become reality.

6.SummaryEnglish: Kusuo is now a third-year student living as a normal teenager with no psychic powers. Sort of. But being normal is harder than he thought.
